keys.string: Do you even feel like you’re being watched?
Like there’s always someone there. Scrutinizing your every action.
Like your life's on rails and deviation from the norm will result in punishment.
Like your entire life is a simulation controlled by someone else.
I guess we can leave it a arbitrary social constructs then.
I’ve got things to do now.
